Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, east of the Evenborough Park.
Room.LongDescription: The large Evenborough Park seems out of place in the busy city, next to the prime commercial districts to the south and west, and just across the lake from the Lyanden Castle. However, the park provides a serene atmosphere for people to talk without being bothered. This restful meditation makes the citizens of the city much happier and therefore, more productive.
